name: df-resv
body: |- wceq(cresv, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cif(cv(s0), co(cv(s0), csts, cop(cfv(csca, cnx), co(cfv(csca, cv(s0)), cress, cv(s1)))), wss(cfv(cbs, cfv(csca, cv(s0))), cv(s1)))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ |`v =(s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ if((Base `(Scalar ` s0))⊆ s1, s0,(s0[sSet]<(Scalar ` ndx),((Scalar ` s0)[|`s]s1)>)))
comment: Define an operator to restrict the scalar field component of an extended structure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Sep-2018.)
